rigel.files package

Submodules

rigel.files.decoder module

class rigel.files.decoder.YAMLDataDecoder[source]

Bases: object

A class to decode YAML data.

Decoding is done by iterating through the entire YAML data and replacing all marked variables with the correspondent values. Variables are marked by delimiters {{ and }}. Values can be stored either inside a mapping of user-defined variables on the Rigelfile and on environment variables. Values declares inside the mapping of user-defined variables has precedence over values stored as environment variables.

decode(data: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Decode YAML data.

Parameters:

data (Dict[str, Any]) – The YAML data to be decoded.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

Returns:

The decoded YAML data.
